message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with video captioning, which involves analyzing visual and audio information to generate natural language descriptions of the video content. This suggests that the paper could belong to several sub-categories related to computer vision (cs.CV), natural language processing (cs.CL), multimedia (cs.MM), machine learning (cs.LG), and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Among these, cs.CV and cs.CL are the most likely categories, as they directly relate to the visual and linguistic aspects of video captioning, respectively. However, since the paper also discusses multi-modal fusion and training strategies, it could also be relevant to cs.MM, cs.LG, and cs.AI, which deal with similar topics in the context of machine learning and artificial intelligence.
